page.title: 08LEISURE TIME : HULL
page.content: There is a fairly wide range of facilities in the area.Some of those listed were a Sports Centre,Swimming Pools,Libraries,pubs,Clubs and Parks. Activities connected with the Church also featured largely in our children's discussion - these included Sunday School,Cubs,Brownies,Scouts, Guides,Young wives and Mother and Toddler Clubs.Activities specifically for children such as Dance Classes, Karate,Judo and Discos are held at the Community Centre.Family activities seem to centre on videos and television. When asked how they and their families spent their leisure time the children seemed to prefer the activities organised by the Church and the Community Centre and made full use of them,whilst adults in the main went to pubs and clubs.
